subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gilbert Arenas had 36 points, 11 assists and 7 rebounds last night as the host Washington Wizards beat the Detroit Pistons, 104-99, in a first-place showdown.
snippet: Gilbert Arenas had 36 points, 11 assists and 7 rebounds last night as the host Washington Wizards beat the Detroit Pistons, 104-99, in a first-place showdown.
